About

I started this blog in 2015 to be able to collect my thoughts and keep track of my ongoing attempt into entrepreneurship. This post has more info on what I initially carved out to do.

For those who are curious about how I setup this blog, it's mostly thanks to this post by Joshua Lande.

Thanks for reading!
